document.full_text: after a week of deliberations, a juror in the insider trading trial of raj rajaratnam was excused for health reasons and the judge told the jury that it must now begin anew.
document.title: juror in rajaratnam trial is replaced
lines_and_colors: after a week of deliberations, a juror in the insider trading trial of raj rajaratnam was excused for health reasons and the judge told the jury that it must now begin anew.
